ratings.comment: He is a very nice guy, but the amount of time he requires spent is ridiculous. His grading is very subjective, seems almost impossible to get anything higher than a B. Talking to other people with other professors, seems like his class requires more than double the work other classes have. Recommend any other professor when taking this class.

Assignments are mostly wastes of time. It genuinely requires double the amount of work to go from a B to an A. Just pick another communications professor that doesn't expect engineers to give up their lives for a communications class.
